thread.title: Terrifying moment a man, 22, is kidnapped from busy pub and bundled into car
thread.title_full: Terrifying moment a man, 22, is kidnapped from busy pub and bundled into car

author: mirror
title: Terrifying moment a man, 22, is kidnapped from busy pub and bundled into car
text:
Terrifying moment a man, 22, is kidnapped from busy pub and bundled into car The victim was driven around before he managed to escape with facial injuries Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Moment man is DRAGGED from a busy pub in shocking kidnap Share this video Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Police have released CCTV footage of the moment a man was kidnapped from a busy pub and bundled into a car. 
The man was dragged out of the Blue Lagoon bar in Bristol by a number of men before being assaulted and put into a car. 
He managed to escape after being driven through the city and was left with facial injuries. 
He required hospital treatment following the incident at 10.20pm on December 15. The victim is dragged along the floor after being hauled out of the pub (Photo: Bristol Post WS) 
Police have now released the footage as part of their investigation, the Bristol Post reported . 
The victim appears to be having a quiet pint with friends before the men walk in and begin circling those who are sitting down drinking. 
A short tussle takes place before one of the men is grabbed hold of and taken out of the pub. The victim lies helplessly as he is dragged out of the building (Photo: Bristol Post WS) The abduction came after a tussle between the men (Photo: Bristol Post WS) 
Detective Chief Inspector Duncan Wood said: "This was a terrifying event for the young man involved and it's fortunate he didn't sustain any lasting injuries. 
"Thankfully, incidents of this kind are rare in Avon and Somerset but when they do happen we take them extremely seriously. 
"As part of our investigation we're releasing footage from inside the Blue Lagoon in the hope the public can help us identify the men pictured. The incident was captured on CCTV (Photo: Bristol Post WS) The Blue Lagoon in Bristol, where the terrifying incident happened (Photo: Google Streetview) 
"Do you recognise any of them? Did you witness the incident in or around the bar on the night of December 15? 
"Anyone with information, however insignificant you might think it is, who hasn't yet contacted us is asked to get in touch." 
A 32-year-old man and a 28-year-old man have been arrested in connection with this incident. They have both been released on bail until February 17. 
Anyone with information is asked to call 101 using reference number 5216278474. Like us on Facebook
